name: Galactic Storm
description: Galactic Storm is a top down shoot'em up. It features distinct weapons, fast action and epic boss battles.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
